description.narrative: The program will support the School Sector Development Plan (SSDP), which is the government's major education initiative for FY2017-FY2023. The Asian Development Bank (ADB) and eight other joint financing partners (JFPs) will finance the program with the government during FY2017-FY2021 through a sector-wide approach.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Equitable access to quality secondary education enhanced

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Percentage of students enrolled in science subjects in grade 11 increased to 6.0% (girls) and 14.0% (boys) (2015 baseline: girls, 2.1%; boys, 5.0%)

description.narrative: Equitable access to quality secondary education enhanced

title.narrative: Cohort survival rate for grades 1-10 increased to 50.0% (2015 baseline: 37.9%)

description.narrative: Equitable access to quality secondary education enhanced

title.narrative: GER in secondary education (grades 9?12) increased to 66.7 (girls: 66.6; boys: 66.8) (2015 baseline: 56.7 [girls: 56.6; boys: 56.8])

description.narrative: Equitable access to quality secondary education enhanced
